the 'dir' attribute value can be 'auto'
'link' target must not reference a manifest ID

the unique identifier must not be empty
'dc:identifier' must not be empty

'authority' metadata can refine a subject expression
'authority' metadata can only refine a subject expression
'authority' metadata must be associated to a term
'authority' metadata must not be defined more than once
'belongs-to-collection' metadata can identify the publication's collection
'belongs-to-collection' metadata can only refine other 'belongs-to-collection' metadata
'collection-type' cannot be used as a primary metadata
'collection-type' metadata can only refine a 'belongs-to-collection' property
'collection-type' metadata cannot be defined more than once to refine the same expression
'display-seq' metadata is allowed
'display-seq' metadata cannot be defined more than once to refine the same expression
'file-as' metadata is allowed
'file-as' metadata cannot be defined more than once to refine the same expression
'group-position' metadata is allowed
'group-position' metadata cannot be defined more than once to refine the same expression
'identifier-type' metadata can only refine a 'source' or 'identifier' property
'identifier-type' metadata cannot be defined more than once to refine the same expression
'role' metadata can be used once or more to refine a creator, contributor, or publisher
'role' metadata cannot be used to refine properties other than creator, contributor, or publisher
'source-of' metadata can be used to refine the pagination source
'source-of' metadata value must be "pagination"
'source-of' metadata cannot be used as a primary metadata
'source-of' metadata must refine a 'dc:source' metadata entry
'source-of' metadata cannot be defined more than once to refine the same expression
'term' metadata can refine a subject expression
'term' metadata can only refine a subject expression
'term' metadata must be associated to an authority
'term' metadata must not be defined more than once
'title-type' metadata can be used to refine a title expression
'title-type' metadata can only refine a 'title' expression
'title-type' metadata cannot be defined more than once to refine the same expression
an 'acquire' link can identify the full version of the publication
an 'alternate' link can identify an alternate version of the Package Document
an 'alternate' link must not be paired with other keywords
a 'record' link must have a 'media-type' attribute
a 'record' link cannot refine another property or resource
a 'voicing' link can identify the aural representation of metadata
a 'voicing' link must refine another property or resource
a 'voicing' link must have a 'media-type' attribute
a 'voicing' link resource must have an audio media type
the 'prefix' attribute can be used to define new prefix mappings
syntax errors in the 'prefix' attribute are reported
default vocabularies must not be assigned a prefix
A metadata property with an unknown prefix is reported
